pages.text: $(thing)Augments/$ are like $(l:intro/upgrades)upgrades/$ but are inserted into a $(l:intro/modules)module/$ rather than a $(l:intro/item_router)Modular Router/$. Each module has slots for 4 augments (some augments can be stacked). Augments enhance or extend a module's functionality in various ways.
$(italic)A Vacuum Module with 6 Range Up augments and an XP Vacuum augment/$
